page.title: 17MID-SUSSEX EDUCATION (2)
page.content: {At Great Walstead School:}There are over 300 acres of woods and these sport facilities: CRICKET,SOCCER,HOCKEY,RUGBY, CROSS COUNTRY,ATHLETICS,CAMP BUILDING, RUNNING,SWIMMING,ROUNDERS,SAILING,CLIM BING,CANOEING,NETBALL,TENNIS AND SHOOTING.There is a heated swimming pool,an all-weather pitch for hockey in winter and tennis in summer,there are some new tennis courts and a sports hall is planned.In your spare time you can do:- TYPING,CHESS,BILLIARDS,TABLE TENNIS, TENNIS,CAMP BUILDING,COMPUTER STUDIES, ART,ASSAULT COURSE,NATURE,CANDLE MAKING,CYCLING,CARPENTRY,POTTERY,ASTRO NOMY,MODEL RAILWAYS,PUPPET MAKING, PERFORMING,COOKING,BMX & RIDING and so on. For information look in the school magazine.
